fields.label: Comments
fields.description: The comments are shown when the user displays the suggested answers for all slides.

fields.label: Specific slide number
fields.description: Only applicable when 'Specific slide number' is selected

fields.label: Invisible
fields.description: Default cursor, no title and no tab index. Warning: Users with disabilities or keyboard only users will have trouble using this element.

fields.label: Image
fields.description: Image background should have a 2:1 width to height ratio to avoid stretching. High resolution images will display better on larger screens.

fields.label: Image
fields.description: Image background should have a 2:1 width to height ratio to avoid stretching. High resolution images will display better on larger screens.

fields.default: បោះពុម្ពស្លាយទាំងអស់

fields.default: គ្មានចំណងជើង

fields.label: Label for uncompleted interactions
fields.default: ស្លាយ «@slideName» មានកិច្ចការអន្តរកម្មដែលមិនបានបញ្ចប់

fields.label: Label for completed interactions
fields.default: ស្លាយ «@slideName» មានកិច្ចការអន្តរកម្មដែលបានបញ្ចប់

fields.default: ស្លាយ @index ក្នុងចំណោម @total

fields.label: Label for slides that only contains correct answers
fields.default: ស្លាយ «@slideName» មានតែចម្លើយដែលត្រឹមត្រូវ។

fields.label: Label for slides that has incorrect answers
fields.default: ស្លាយ «@slideName» មានចម្លើយមិនត្រឹមត្រូវ។

fields.default: ចែករំលែកលទ្ធផល

fields.label: Total score announcement for assistive technologies
fields.default: អ្នកទទួលបានពិន្ទុ @score លើ @maxScore

fields.label: Entered fullscreen announcement for assistive technologies
fields.default: បានបើក «ពេញអេក្រង់»

fields.label: Exited fullscreen announcement for assistive technologies
fields.default: បានបិទ «ពេញអេក្រង់»

semantics.label: Behaviour settings.
semantics.description: These options will let you override behaviour settings.

fields.label: Activate Active Surface Mode
fields.description: Removes navigation controls for the end user. Use Go To Slide to navigate.

fields.label: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.description: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: Override "Retry" button
fields.description: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: Show "Show solution" button in the summary slide
fields.description: If enabled, the learner will be able to show the solutions for all question when they reach the summary slide

fields.label: Show "Retry" button in the summary slide
fields.description: If enabled, the learner will be able to retry all questions when they reach the summary slide. Be advised that by refreshing the page the learners will be able to retry even if this button isn't showing.

fields.label: Social Settings
fields.description: These options will let you override social behaviour settings. Empty values will be filled in automatically if a link is provided, otherwise all values will be generated.

fields.label: Share to Facebook link
fields.default: @currentpageurl

fields.label: Share to Facebook quote
fields.default: I scored @score out of @maxScore on a task at @currentpageurl.

fields.label: Share to Twitter statement
fields.default: I scored @score out of @maxScore on a task at @currentpageurl.

fields.label: Share to Twitter link
fields.default: @currentpageurl

fields.label: Share to Twitter hashtags
fields.default: h5p, course

fields.label: Share to Google link
fields.default: @currentpageurl
